faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about Random
faq.a1: Simple: you click, we create a group of 5 people near you and choose a random bar. You just need to show up!
faq.a2: Yes, completely free during the beta in Paris until September 1st. Lyon is coming soon.
faq.q3: What if I don't like the chosen bar?
faq.a3: That's the magic of Random! The idea is to discover new places and live unexpected experiences. Trust us ðŸ˜‰
faq.a4: Our algorithm creates balanced groups of 5 people based on availability and proximity. Each Random is a surprise!
faq.q5: What if someone doesn't show up?
faq.a5: Don't worry, it happens! The group continues with the people present. The goal is to have fun with whoever comes.
